name: Cabygame
description:
Game developed entirely in assembly language with CBM prg Studio.

PATAGONIA's first game, and many more to come.

Cabygame: Our friend will have to dodge different obstacles during his ride on an electric skateboard.

- 7 speeds
- 4 bonuses
- 1 slowdown
- 4 seasons: summer, autumn, winter and spring
- 1 end at 9999 points.
- Clouds & Sun

Every 100 points, the distance between obstacles is reduced. It is notable at 5000 points or from 8000 points you will have a horde of obstacles!

The item "Slow" reduces the speed by one point. Maybe it is more necessary when you are at full speed, and you can avoid it when you are at low speed :)

Music by Uctumi

To spend a good few hours playing with your favorite emulator or real hardware.

Joystick on Port2. Only button to play.

Recommended for: C64 PAL or Drean, also works in NTSC.

Don't stop playing.

Enjoy it!

CSDB: https://csdb.dk/group/?id=11549
